apps.name: AltStore
apps.versionDescription:
This beta improves reliability based on all the feedback you've provided, so thank you all so much! I've sent out an email with much more info, but here are the highlights:

News
- Adds News tab to provide news updates about AltStore or any other apps.
â€“ Receive push notifications for new news updates.

Patreon Integration
- Becoming a patron and linking your account now gives you access to beta versions of apps, including AltStore and Delta.
- NOTE: For testing, betas will be enabled if you link any Patreon account (not just if you're a patron).

UI Improvements
- Settings screen has been redesigned
- Login flow has been redesigned
- UI is now more or less finished, with only very minor tweaks left.

I'm aiming to launch AltStore within the next couple of weeks, so please report any issues you have ASAP!

permissions.usageDescription: AltStore periodically refreshes apps in the background to prevent them from expiring.
Allows AltStore to run longer than 30 seconds when refreshing apps in background.

permissions.usageDescription: AltStore periodically refreshes apps in the background to prevent them from expiring.
Allows AltStore to run longer than 30 seconds when refreshing apps in background.

apps.name: Delta
apps.subtitle: Classic games in your pocket.
apps.versionDescription:
- Adds ability to copy + open deep links for games
- Adds custom NES controller skin
- Renames "Sustain Button" to "Hold Button"
- Fixes N64 controller skin obscured by notch
- Misc. UI improvements

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Delta to use images from your Photo Library as game artwork.

apps.name: Delta
apps.subtitle: Classic games in your pocket.
apps.versionDescription: Includes initial support for DS games.
apps.localizedDescription:
The next console for Delta is coming: this beta version of Delta brings support for playing DS games.

DS support currently includes:
â€¢Â Playing DS games
â€¢ Save States
â€¢ Hold Button

Features I'm still working on:
â€¢ Fast Forward
â€¢ Cheats
â€¢ Controller skin (using placeholder controller skin for now)

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Delta to use images from your Photo Library as game artwork.

apps.name: Delta Lite
apps.subtitle: Classic games in your pocket.
apps.localizedDescription: Delta Lite brings NES games to iOS.

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Delta to use images from your Photo Library as game artwork.

apps.name: Delta Lite
apps.subtitle: Classic games in your pocket.
apps.versionDescription: Adds support for GBC games in addition to NES.
apps.localizedDescription: Delta Lite brings NES and GBC games to iOS.

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Delta to use images from your Photo Library as game artwork.

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Clip to continuously monitor your clipboard in the background.

news.title: Delta Now Available
news.caption: After almost 5 years in development, Delta is finally finished.

news.title: Why Clip?
news.caption: Clip lets you track your clipboard history even when in the background, something App Store apps can't do.

news.title: Delta Gaining DS Support
news.caption: Check out the upcoming DS support before everyone else when you become a Patron.

news.title: Welcome to AltStore
news.caption: Check out the FAQ for more information on how to install apps.
